work_experience.job_summary:
•Acted in the roles of junior, senior, and lead developer on many projects.
•Focused on front-end development with jQuery, Angular, and React.
•Designed the data structure and contributed to implementing the best algorithms 
to optimize the time and space complexity.
•Led a small team to develop the eCommerce platform with React and Django.

•Assisted the front-end team in a fast-growing project, focusing on a mobile-first 
development with React.
•Set up the testing environment with Jest and Enzyme in the front-end and ensured 
it was stable with over 90% test coverage.
•Customized the Material-UI based on the designer's style guide and constructed 
dozens of styled components for reusability throughout the app.
•Reviewed and mentored developers's work.
•Oversaw the completion of features from the front to back end.

•Developed a robust ordering platform with React and Node.js. Solved fault-tolerant 
and architectural problems in AWS.
•Built curry functions for Redux-Saga middleware to reuse them throughout 
projects.
•Contributed to an auto-scaling system using AWS auto-scaling and AWS SQS to 
handle multiple requests in one AWS EC2 instance.
•Built the Docker environment which contained several microservices in one script.
